page.title: 08Wild life in Yarde
page.content: In Yarde there is quite a lot of wild life.{At night}we hear the{owls } calling to each other.They are usually the{Barn Owls}which live in the barn which is being converted. We sometimes see the{bats}flying around which live in the old stable. We know that at night there are {foxes and badgers}because we have seen dead ones on the road. In the day we see{buzzards}in the woods circling above.The{heron}flies over head and down to the stream.Our ducks get very scared. We had{rats}living in our shed,so we put poison{down.Rabbits and mice} have eaten some of the vegetables in our vegetable patch. There are{trout}in the stream.
